220 kΩ ± 5%, 25 V (Extended Power Range not implemented)/ 50 V (Extended Power Range implemented).
Recommend having a placeholder for an 0201 Rb resistor between the AC cap and Type-C connector on the SSTX pairs.
76-94 Ω including tolerance. Insertion loss ≥ -2.5 dB @ 2.5 GHz, ≥ -3.3 dB @ 5.0 GHz. Crosstalk ≤ -33 dB @ 5-10 GHz.
USB3.2 Gen 2x2 (10 Gbps per lane) and DP2.1 (HBR3 up to 8.1Gbps per lane)
If 60 mm < BO+M[1:6] ≤ 85 mm then Mcable ≤ 127 mm.
Microstrip main route routing must be interleaved.
To reduce system RFI/ EMI, it is recommended to use SL instead of MS. If MS routing is needed, refer to EMC PDG for RFI/ EMI mitigation.
